snippet.title: Amber Heard says Depp accused her of affairs with Leo DiCaprio & Channing Tatum
snippet.description: Amber Heard says Johnny Depp accused her of "having affairs with Leonardo DiCaprio and Channing Tatum".Today is the tenth day of the 57-year-old Hollywood actor's libel trial against the publishers of The Sun.Depp is suing News Group Newspapers over an article that appeared in The Sun in 2018 which branded him a "wife beater"- claims which he denies.Lawyers for NGN are defending their case based on Amber Heard's 14 allegations of abuse.Star witness Heard gave evidence at the High Court in London today, and she claimed that her ex husband accused her of having "affairs" with many actors she's worked with.  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   Heard alleges that the actor accused her of having relations with Leonardo DiCaprio and Channing Tatum.She said: "I had to justify to him why I was doing any movie, and it was much worse if there was any kissing or a sex scene in it."He would insist every male actor was trying to sleep with me and/or that I had had an affair with them, that he’d spoken to people and knew all about it.  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   "He would try and catch me out by taking my phone or telling me someone had told him I was having an affair and act as if he had information proving it – when I really hadn't."  Heard continued: "He accused me of having affairs with each of my co-stars, movie after movie: Eddie Redmayne, James Franco, Jim Sturgess, Kevin Costner, Liam Hemsworth, BillyBob Thornton, Channing Tatum; even women co-stars like Kelly Garner.   "He also accused me of having affairs with stars I auditioned with, like Leonardo DiCaprio. He would taunt me about it – especially when he was drunk or high – and had derogatory nicknames for every one of my male co-stars he considered a sexual threat. For example, Leonardo DiCaprio was "pumpkin-head", Channing Tatum was "potato-head" and "Jim Turd Sturgess"."He demanded to know about any romantic scene in a film and complained about how people can watch me "get f***ed on camera". He would even get himself copies of the scripts I was looking at, without asking me, to review them for himself."  Read More Related Articles   Read More Related Articles    Amber also noted that Depp would "call directors" she was working with on set and also would sometimes "complain about nudity" after he saw the film cut.Heard said that Depp was "obsessed" with who she had slept with and dated in the past.She said: Johnny also frequently made reference to my exes. He was very jealous and would obsess about who I had slept with and been out with before him.   "He spoke possessively of me as "my woman" and made comments that he wished he had found me before I had slept with anyone else, joking he would have locked me away at 14."Amber also said in court today that Depp threatened to kill her and said she 'would get raped' because of the sexy dresses she wore.
